𐀔 ma manu main middle mother? :

𐙁 MA 󲍲 mao 猫 maō 𓏇𓇋𓅱𓃠 miuw 𐙁 looks like face ☺ with ears exactly like 󲍲 or exactly like 𐙬 reverse

𐙁 MA looks like face with horns:

𐙁 MA ≈ 𔑺 ≈ 𔒅 ma ⋍ 𔒄 ma = 𔒃 MA 𐙁 MA ⇔ 𔑻 Vieh 𔑿 𔑺 𔑾 𔒀 MI Muhn 𓏠 𓈖 𓃒 𓃾 𓄀

𐙁 MA mun 𒊩 𐀴 𐘠 feminine gender

𐙁 𔓬 #MONS mountain ⇔ munus 𒊩 !

𐙁 MA 𔗗 ⇔ 𔗖 medina ⇔ 𔕿 Messer 𔖻 mi 𐘦 𔘂 DE degen?

𐙁 MA 𜏠 ma @ Elamite ⇔ 𜓚 ≈ 𜓫 ≈ 𜐛·𜒷 ☑

𐙁 MA mostly looks like a face with horns or ears 𔓷 ☺ or a circle with two lines, exactly like 𐙬 reverse ⇔ 𐙮 𐙔
